#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long i64;
int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int qu,t;
    cin >> qu >> t;
    while(t--){
        int x,y,a,b,p,q;
        cin >> x >> y >> a >> b >> p >> q;
        i64 a2[3];
        a2[0]=(x-a)*(x-a)+(y-b)*(y-b);
        a2[1]=(x-p)*(x-p)+(y-q)*(y-q);
        a2[2]=(a-p)*(a-p)+(b-q)*(b-q);
        sort(a2,a2+3);
        if(qu==2){
            if(a2[0]+a2[1]==a2[2]){
                if(a2[0]==a2[1] || a2[1]==a2[2] || a2[0]==a2[2]){
                    cout<<"Isosceles right triangle\n";
                }
                else{
                    cout<<"Scalene right triangle\n";
                }
            }
            else if(a2[0]+a2[1]-a2[2]>0
                    && a2[1]+a2[2]-a2[0]>0
                    && a2[0]+a2[2]-a2[1]>0){
                if(a2[0]==a2[1] || a2[1]==a2[2] || a2[0]==a2[2]){
                    cout<<"Isosceles acute triangle\n";
                }
                else{
                    cout<<"Scalene acute triangle\n";
                }
            }
            else{
                if(a2[0]==a2[1] || a2[1]==a2[2] || a2[0]==a2[2]){
                    cout<<"Isosceles obtuse triangle\n";
                }
                else{
                    cout<<"Scalene obtuse triangle\n";
                }
            }
        }
        else if(qu==1){
            if(a2[0]==a2[1] || a2[1]==a2[2] || a2[0]==a2[2]){
                cout<<"Isosceles triangle\n";
            }
            else{
                cout<<"Scalene triangle\n";
            }
        }
    }
	return 0;
}
